噋字的基本解释

噋
tūn
〔噋噋〕沉重缓慢的样子，如“大车噋噋。”

噋
kuò
敲击声。

噋字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tūn］
［《廣韻》他昆切，平魂，透。］
同“啍1”。
迟重；敦厚。

噋字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　噋； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页208第21
【廣韻】【集韻】?他昆切，音暾。【玉篇】同啍。【集韻】本作?。詳前啍字註。　又【集韻】徒渾切，音屯。義同。又【廣韻】苦郭切，音廓。噋噋，聲也。亦作㗥。

噋字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
噋字的起名意思

暂无。

噋
Basic explanation of words
噋
tūn
〔噋噋〕Heavy and slow, like "The big car is 噋噋."
噋
kuò
Percussion.
噋
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tūn］
["Guangyun" he Kunqie, calm and thorough. ]
Same as "啍1".
Late and heavy; honest and sincere.
噋
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 1] [Words Department] 　噋; Kangxi strokes: 15; Page number: page 208-21
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? He Kun Qi, Yin Tun. 【Jade articles】Same bite. [Ji Yun] This work?. Please refer to the previous note.　[Jiyun] Tuhun cut, Yintun. The same meaning. [Guang Yun] bitter Guo cut, sound profile. Hey, sound. Also made 㗥.

to swallow hastily; to gobble up
